name: Fold7
description: We are a 21st Century agency for the 21st Century consumer. The agency first established itself as the creative force behind Ted Baker before working with brands including Nike and Orange. We believe in the power of creating everyday magic for its clients. It can't be bottled, but everyday magic can help provide lasting momentum for brands. Current clients include Hilton, Gumtree, Magners, Audible, money.co.uk, Coppafeel! and Carlsberg.
